word_mean: 恐水病，狂犬病：在狂犬病的急性神经症状期，由于咽喉痉挛引起疼痛所致的窒息和惧怕饮水

sentence.Network_en: Hydrophobia will occur and get head even in the coldest weather.
sentence.Network_cn: 狂犬病即使在最冷的天气里也会发生并加剧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 恐水症状比较突出,故本病又名恐水症（hydrophobia）。投诉回复内容猛击这里查看更多专家答案>>
狂字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 狂怒〖 unbridledrage〗 狂犬病〖 hydrophobia〗 狂人〖 lunatic;maniacmadman〗.
狂犬病（Rabies），又称恐水病（Hydrophobia）,是由狂犬病毒引起感染所致的以损害中枢神经系统为主的一种自然疫源性或动物源 …

list.abs: objective : to study the effect complication and effect of immunoresponsivenss on the people who are bitten by dog and injected hydrophobia bacterin .目的：观察研究不同性别、年龄、体质及居住地区人群被犬咬伤注射狂犬病疫苗后的免疫应答效果与影响因素。
retrospection and administration of human hydrophobia vaccine ., 人用狂犬疫苗的回顾与展望.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via late Latin from Greek hudrophobia, from hudro- 'water' + phobos 'fear'

means.word_mean: 1. a symptom of rabies in humans consisting of an aversion to swallowing liquids
3. an acute viral disease of the nervous system of warm-blooded animals (usually transmitted by the bite of a rabid animal); rabies is fatal if the virus reaches the brain

stems_affixes.word_buile: hydro水+phobia厌恶→n.狂犬病, 恐水病
